reviewText:
This is now one of my favorite DVD concerts. The music is wonderful. The photography is wonderful. Broza is amazing. I first watched this video on TV when it was a PBS special, after I stumbled upon it by accident, and fell in love with it. It was several years later that the DVD was made available.
I recently lent my DVD to a friend, and after the first song, he texted me, "Wow!" Yeah, I agree.
